description:
T8 Fig Tree in front garden - Reduce crown back to previous reduction points (max), crown lift by 1-2m.
T9 Eucalyptus Tree in front garden - crown reduce back to previous points of reduction on low lateral growth and a crown reduction in length of up to 4m of leading top branches to suitable strong growth (slightly more or less depending on finding a strong growth point to prune to).
T6 Magnolia in front garden: Reduce crown by 10-15%
decision_conditions: The original specification for T2 (on application) Eucalyptus has been changed after consultation with the agent. Reduction back to previous points of reduction would have led to the tree being reduced by up to 8m in height (up to 50% height reduction). This was deemed excessive without a sound arboricultural justification. The specification has been reduced to take into consideration the local concerns whilst keeping the tree in a healthy condition.
